casebody.data:
LIPE
v.
STARR DAVIS COMPANY, INC., et al. No. 445P14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Travelers Casualty & Surety. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte. Michael B. Pross, for Lipe, Shirley, et al. Cathy A. Williams, for Lipe, Shirley, et al. Jeri L. Whitfield, for N.C. Chamber and N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys. Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, for N.C. Chamber and N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of January 2015 by Defendant (Travelers Casualty & Surety) to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
